text: Charles Robert Larson (November 20, 1936 â€“ July 26, 2014) was an American four-star Admiral of the United States Navy. A 1958 graduate of the United States Naval Academy, Larson twice served as Superintendent of the U.S. Naval Academy in Annapolis, Maryland. He also served as Commander in Chief, United States Pacific Command (CINCPAC). Larson died in his home in Annapolis, Maryland, after a two-year battle with leukemia at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *ViaGlobal Group official website Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American admirals Category:Military people from South Dakota Category:People from Sioux Falls, South Dakota
title: Charles R. Larson
